indication: Weight management in overweight or obese adults without diabetes
safety_population_definition: All randomized participants who received at least one dose of a study drug and had at least one assessment after baseline
All randomly assigned patients who received at least one dose of study drug.
All randomized participants exposed to at least one dose of semaglutide or placebo
All randomized participants who received at least one dose of study treatment
all the participants who underwent randomization and received ≥1 dose of an active drug or placebo

citation: Vanita R Aroda, Jens Aberle, Lars Bardtrum, Erik Christiansen, Filip K Knop, Sanaz Gabery, Sue D Pedersen, John B Buse. Efficacy and safety of once-daily oral semaglutide 25 mg and 50 mg compared with 14 mg in adults with type 2 diabetes (PIONEER PLUS): a multicentre, randomised, phase 3b trial. Lancet 2023; 402: 693–704.
safety_population_definition: all participants who received at least one dose of trial drug
All randomized participants who received at least one dose of medication starting from the evening of day 1.
All randomized participants who received at least one dose of study intervention.
sponsor: Merck Sharp & Dohme LLC, a subsidiary of Merck & Co., Inc.

citation: Fonseca VA, Alvarado-Ruiz R, Raccah D, Boka G, Miossec P, Gerich JE. Efficacy and Safety of the Once-Daily GLP-1 Receptor Agonist Lixisenatide in Monotherapy. Diabetes Care. 2012;35:1225-1231.
safety_population_definition: All randomized patients exposed to at least one dose of investigational drug.

citation: Buse JB, Drucker DJ, Taylor KL, et al. DURATION-1: Exenatide Once Weekly Produces Sustained Glycemic Control and Weight Loss Over 52 Weeks. Diabetes Care. 2010;33:1255-1261.
safety_population_definition: All randomized participants who received at least one dose of exenatide in the previously reported phase of this study.
sponsor: Amylin Pharmaceuticals and Eli Lilly & Company

safety_population_definition: All randomized participants who received at least one dose of maridebart cafraglutide or placebo.
All randomized patients who received ≥1 dose of study drug
sponsor: Amylin Pharmaceuticals, Inc. and Eli Lilly and Company

safety_population_definition: All randomized participants who received at least one dose of albiglutide or placebo
Adults with a BMI of 30 or more, or 27 or more with at least one weight-related complication, excluding diabetes, who received at least one dose of tirzepatide or placebo.
All patients who received one dose of medication

citation: Rosenstock J, Raccah D, Koranyi L, Maffei L, Boka G, Miossec P, Gerich JE. safety_population_definition: All randomized participants exposed to at least one dose of the investigational product.
